title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Short Workshop on Strengthening Language Teacher Capabilities Using Technological Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can create lesson material plans using three types of smartphone-based educational applications.
Students can explain two or more strategies for using digital tools to promote interaction in real-time online classes.
Students can analyze potential problem situations when applying technological tools and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
